mapper.sql: pid, name, apple_shop, description, rate, deductions_way, status, add_time, upd_time, user_ky, reserve1, reserve2
mapper.insert:
insert into product
pid,
name,
apple_shop,
description,
rate,
deductions_way,
status,
add_time,
upd_time,
user_ky,
reserve1,
reserve2,
#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appleShop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{description,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{deductionsWay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update product
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apple_shop = #{appleShop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
deductions_way = #{deductionsWay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_ky = #{userKy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reserve1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reserve2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apple_shop = #{appleShop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, deductions_way = #{deductionsWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_ky = #{userKy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserve1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserve2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
